item.title: 【错误记录】Failed to fetch
item.author: Mosan
item.description: 在学习过程中遇到的一个例子，无法运行，例子的代码如下 <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en-US"> <head> <meta charset="utf-8"> <title>My test page</title> </head> <body> <p>This is my page</p> <script> /*let promise = fetch('coffee.jpg'); let promise2 = promise.then(response=>response.blob()); let promise3 = promise2.then(myBlob=>{ let objectURL = URL.createObjectURL(myBlob); let image = document.createElement('img'); image.src = objectURL; document.body.appendChild(image); });*/ fetch('coffee.jpg') .then(response
